me.Salt.Command

Class CommandDescriptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Salt.Command.CommandDescriptionBuilder

  • public class CommandDescriptionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims to act as a builder for building instances of CommandDescription.
